actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 96-1525.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the printing as a House Document of the report of the Committee on Small Business entitled "Conglomerate Mergers--Their Effect on Small Business and Local Communities".

summary.text: Directs the printing as a House document of the report by the Committee on Small Business entitled "Conglomerate Mergers - Their Effects on Small Business and Local Communities." Authorizes additional printing at a specified amount for use by such Committee.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the printing as a House Document of the report of the Committee on Small Business entitled "Conglomerate Mergers--Their Effect on Small Business and Local Communities".
